job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of embedding AI capabilities into a software product, spanning both client-side and server-side development.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: This refers to managing the full lifecycle and responsibility of the software product, a key aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly outlines traditional software architecture and coding for web applications, with AI serving as an enhancement to user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with specific LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) and creating tools/features, which falls under applying and developing with AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle management, a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to understanding business needs (educational outcomes, efficiency) and aligning technical solutions to achieve them.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement emphasizes building and integrating AI, specifically LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude, into full-stack web applications. This involves a strong foundation in software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A) such as architecture, coding, and product ownership, combined with specific work on generative AI technologies (Macro-Category B). The role requires a balanced mix of these two areas, fitting the definition of a Core GenAI Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning the technologies (LLMs), the integration into full-stack applications, and the ownership expected. This allows for a high degree of confidence in the analysis and profile assignment.
